com.milk.uberchat.iface
Interface ChatSystemTemplate

All Superinterfaces:
Editable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ICBSystemTemplate, IRCSystemTemplate, SBSystemTemplate
public interface ChatSystemTemplate
extends Editable

This is the interface that all templates for ChatSystem creation must adhere to. In addition to the methods here, actual template classes will have an interesting set of fields having to do with the specifics of the system they are for.

This interface is defined to extend Editable as both the way for users to tweak the parameters of a system, and in order to facilitate saving and loading.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

getEditor
 

Method Detail

copy

public ChatSystemTemplate copy()
Make a copy of this template. We don't just use Object.clone() because that method is declared to throw a checked exception, and it's a big pain in the butt when you have a method that's declared to throw a checked exception (CloneNotSupportedException, natch), but you know in your heart of hearts that it will never actually throw it because of all the other restrictions you've placed on the system, and how you're using it, etc. Java just sucks that way sometimes.

Returns:
a copy of this template

makeSystem

public ChatSystem makeSystem()
Turn this template into an actual ChatSystem.

Returns:
a ChatSystem corresponding to this template
